name: The Scrambled Egg-scape
description:
You’re about to be turned into an omelette! In this 3rd person 3D puzzle/platformer game, roll your egg around the kitchen and try to escape before the humans turn you into a delicious brunch. You only have 4 minutes to escape kitchen before you are cooked into an omelette. Try and escape and then see if you can do it quicker and get a better time. 

Features:

  • Speed Based Fall Damage
  • Interactive Environment
  • Interactive Animations
  • Embedded Timer
  • Egg-Like movement
